name: Salvation (pocorbin)
description:
Salvation is a new type of shoot'em up!

The moon itself is coming down on Earth and is about to destroy it. Take control of Earth's canons and defend yourself from the moon... and the rain of asteroids that will follow!

These space debris are orbiting the Earth at high speeds : You'll have to shoot in all directions around the blue planet if you want to stand a chance.

You are humanity's last hope. Good luck!
